basic_data.name: Herodion Hotel
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: FAMILY HOSPITALITY AMID MONUMENTAL VIEWS Hotel HERODION, a superior first class hotel, the only with sweeping views of both the Acropolis and the acclaimed New Acropolis Museum, distanced only a few meters from its south entrance. Right in the heart of the upscale Acropolis residential neighborhood, part of the pedestrian walk unifying the most important archaeological sites, it is also near to the Plaka and Thissio districts as well as to the trendy areas of Gazi and Kerameikos. Framed by a museum-quality modern sculpture at the entrance, it is a superior, first class hotel with elegant contemporary look, classic in character and discreet in artistic touch, it is strategically located close to the metro station connecting to both the international airport and Piraeus port a gateway to the Greek Isles, two stops away from the city centre Guests of the HERODION Hotel enjoy a host of modern living amenities. The service is attentive and the 90 guest rooms are tastefully appointed, some with a spectacular view to the Acropolis. From rooftop lounges rich in sunbathing facilities, outdoor Jacuzzis and a unique outdoor bar and restaurant with breathtaking views, to the winter garden atrium and spacious dining areas – it’s easy to sit back and take it in all the surrounding beauty and history – well-equipped for executives and vacationers alike. POINT α , our roof top Bar-restaurant is a breathtaking experience. It is the closest you can get to viewing the Acropolis and the New Acropolis Museum. Serving Greek/ Mediterranean Contemporary cuisine with a summer brisk, drinks and cocktails prepared by our professional bartender, is open from May to Oct, 19:00 to 00:00/ [option of private dining]

basic_data.name: The Athens Gate Hotel
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: The Athens Gate Hotel is located in the historic district of Athens exactly opposite the Temple of Olympian Zeus. It is 400 m away from the Acropolis, 200 m away from the new Acropolis Museum, and on the doorstep of Plaka, the heart of the tourist district of Athens. It has recently been taken over by new Management, and fully renovated. Its style is modern and simple, as befits the area. New features include LCD TV in all rooms. In 2015 The Athens Gate Hotel was announced best case Hotel, under a research conducted by National and Kapodistrian University of Athens in order to identify energy consumption patterns and best efficiency in buildings in Attica Hotel sector.

basic_data.name: Inn Athens Hotel
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: We’ve managed to bring together comfort and modern design in the perfect location. Right in the center of Athens, just a few steps from Syntagma square, the never sleeping Ermou str. and the breathtaking Acropolis we have established the ideal urban destination. With 37 rooms in total, our goal is for you to enjoy a personalized experience, reminiscent of the vintage yet industrialized city of Athens. Greek marble and steel come together harmonically and bring out the Greek chic character of the rooms and the lobby area. Each room is unique and all elements are handpicked and custom made. Our philosophy is quite simple, we wish for our visitors to feel comfortable and at home in such a way that their stay in our hotel will be part of a unique experience of their trip in Athens.

basic_data.name: Estia Boutique Apartments
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: UNIQUE BOUTIQUE APARTMENTS IN ATHENS Situated in the historic district of Metaxourgeio, near the acropolis and some of the most renowned sights and attractions of Athens, Estia’s fascinating boutique central apartments will certainly exceed your expectations. Each designed to reflect the culture of a particular region in Greece, welcomes you to experience the epitome of the Greek life. From mouth-watering Greek breakfast, business arrangements and sightseeing excursions, this is your gate to the authentic Greek way of living. So, if you are seeking for a one-of-a-kind accommodation in Athens, Greece, plan the most delightful family vacations or holidays with friends in the heart of the city. Surrender to the modern comforts and refined pleasures offered at these upscale apartments in Athens and experience the authentic Greek hospitality in its finest form.

basic_data.name: Electra Palace Athens
basic_data.priceRange: $$ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: Stately, with the air of an era long gone, the Electra Palace Athens, hospitable and aristocratic, awaits to welcome you in the heart of the city. Classical in its architecture and design, blending beautifully with the noble historical buildings of the Plaka area, the hotel’s elegant luxury is complemented by the majestic views of the Acropolis that can be enjoyed from the rooftop restaurant, pool, rooms and suites. Marble bathrooms; soft duvets; handmade carpets; custom furniture; these are but a few of the details that make the Electra Palace Athens luxuriously enjoyable. The amenities of our hotel will leave you wanting for nothing more: for your comfort and enjoyment, here you will find satellite T.V.s, laptop size electronic safes, Wi-Fi internet connection, and fully equipped bathrooms with hair dryer, bathrobes and slippers, magnifying mirror and more. Right in the city center and within walking distance from all major sights, easily accessible by car or public transport, the Electra Palace Athens is the ideal hotel for your stay in Athens whether you are here for business or leisure: spend a summer day at our outdoor swimming pool, soaking up the sun of Athens as it rises above the Acropolis – or spend it shopping in the city’s lively markets. Wander through the ancient Agora and visit the Parthenon – then wonder at its glory, all dramatically lit at night, from the balcony of your room. Stroll around the city under the autumn rain, then warm up in the hotel’s sauna. Relax after a day’s hard work - or blow off some steam - at the indoor pool or our gym. Enjoy our delicious contemporary greek cuisine at the award winning “Electra Palace Roof Garden” or at the “Motivo” in the lounge, or with a drink at the “Duck Tail”, our British inspired bar. For bigger celebrations or for business events in the heart of Athens, our hotel’s five-star service extends to our seven meeting rooms and ballrooms: fully equipped, air-conditioned and naturally lit, our halls can cater for up to 350 people for any event type, no matter how formal: host your business meeting here, or organize a successful conference. Or, have the reception or banquet of your dreams, tasteful and impeccable, a festive testament to your own sophisticated style.
features: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

basic_data.name: Grand Hyatt Athens
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: With its spectacular views of the Acropolis and the Aegean Sea and a multitude of deluxe comforts and services, the Grand Hyatt Athens is the optimal 5-star hotel in Athens, Greece near the Acropolis for both business and cosmopolitan travelers spending time in Greece’s capital city. Well located on the prominent Syngrou Avenue, Grand Hyatt Athens is easily accessible to the city’s vibrant historical center and all its top attractions. It’s also walking distance to many of the area’s trendy new shops and cafes. No other property in Athens boasts two rooftop pools, one with a wall of glass, the other an infinity pool that appears to float towards the Acropolis. The property’s 548 guest rooms and suites are notably spacious –starting at 27 square meters. Many leading companies choose the resort to host international conferences and events, thanks to its conference areas--4000 square meters spread on two floors with its own private entrance.

Modern with a classical twist with 216 modernly equipped rooms and suites and a unique sky-light Atrium at the center of the hotel, Electra Metropolis will offer you a personalized stay with a pure Greek hospitality approach.

basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: The Stanley Athens Hotel is a four (4) star hotel, located in Karaiskaki Square near the center of Athens. We are directly in front of the Metaxourghio Metro station, a taxi stand, and tour bus stops, making travel around the city easy and convenient. We feature a stunning rooftop terrace with views of the Acropolis, a swimming pool, bar, and restaurant. Our guest bedrooms have all been recently renovated.

basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: The Management and Staff invite you to enjoy hospitable surroundings and all the pleasures of Athens within easy reach! The Attalos Hotel, situated in the historic district of Athens, has a history of its own. Offering classic, comfortable accommodation, a friendly staff and atmosphere, Attalos Hotel has created a reputation as " Your home away from home in the heart of Athens". All of the hotel's 78 rooms are air-conditioned and fully equipped with central heating, Direct-dial telephone , Satellite TV , Mini refrigerator , Safe box , Private Bathrooms with hair dryers, slippers and bath amenities and of course Free wi-fi access internet. A charming roof garden/bar provides the perfect setting for enjoying a drink under the spectacular view of the Acropolis!

description: Business, leisure or just a city break? Visit the Acropolis or the seaside? Strategically located at the city center, ibis Styles Athens Routes is a brand new 4 star hotel. Only 6' walk from the metro station and 15' walk to the Acropolis museum, the hotel offers the ideal setting to enjoy the city with ease. Rest in our spacious & quiet rooms . Enjoy the cheerful ambiance in our restaurant & bar, have a drink in our hidden garden or discover our modern artwork that decorates the hotel. A pet friendly 4 star hotel with comfortable rooms, colorful restaurant & bar, indoor parking & fitness room.

basic_data.name: Plaka Hotel
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: Most central hotel situated in Plaka district. Strategically located for visiting all main archaeological interests especially the Acropolis and new Acropolis museum, as well as Ancient Agora, Parliament, first Olympic stadium, Benaki museum, Cycladic museum, National garden. Two streets only away from metro station Monastiraki, with direct line from the airport and the port of Piraeus. 50m from the main shopping street Ermou and Plaka touristic shopping area with taverns and bars. Splendid view of the Acropolis from roof terrace not to be missed.

basic_data.name: Acropolis Stay
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: Centrally located in Athens city center,only a 5-minute walk from Acropolis Museum and the neighborhood of Plaka, Acropolis Stay offers modernly decorated rooms with free WiFi access. Guests can reach the city's famous landmarks, including the Parthenon and the Temple of Zeus, within walking distance. Every room is air-conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV, a coffee machine, a toaster and a kettle. Each one includes a modern bathroom with free toiletries and a hairdryer, while some also include a kitchenette. Daily cleaning service is provided. Guests can choose among 6 different breakfast menus, that will be delivered to their room in a breakfast box. Acropolis Metro Station is 200 metres from Acropolis Stay, while Syntagma Square lies within a 15-minute walk. The nearest airport is Elefthérios Venizélos Airport, 37 km from the property.

basic_data.name: Elia Ermou Athens Hotel
basic_data.priceRange: $$ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

basic_data.name: Acropolis Select Hotel
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: Ideally located in the heart of Athens and within walking distance to many of the city’s main attractions, the Acropolis Select Hotel is the perfect place to stay during your next visit to Greece’s capital. A short stroll from the hotel places guests at the ancient site of the Acropolis, the New Acropolis Museum and the Plaka District, while other major landmarks such as Syntagma Square, the Temple of Olympian Zeus and the Flee Market as well as the city’s shopping hotspots are within easy reach. The property is a stone’s throw away from metro, tram and bus stations, making traveling around the city and its beach suburbs very convenient.This 72 room hotel has recently undergone renovation, fitted with elegant Italian design furniture, fine German fabrics and original pieces of art inspired from ancient Greece, which add to its modern, stylish decor and welcoming ambiance. The on-site rooftop restaurant, 180 West, serves snacks and Mediterranean cuisine and offers Acropolis views.

basic_data.name: Niche Hotel Athens
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: The boutique 4 star hotel in the heart of Athens that redefines the meaning of the Athenian hospitality. “Niche” means comfort, rejuvenation and security in accommodation. An accommodation with background one of the biggest stations in Greek culture; Acropolis. Within 3 minutes by foot, the Acropolis Museum is a must-see cultural destination. Enjoy your luxurious stay in a room or suite, the design of which was made to harmonize the contemporary element with the Greek heritage. That’s why recycling materials were mainly used in the reconstruction of the building. Like, for example, the characteristic, idiotypic pattern with marble rhombs that adorns the bathrooms and the old, marble staircase of the building. These are made from Dionysos collectible marbles. Sleep on premium Coco-Mat mattresses made from natural raw materials. These high-quality bed systems will provide support to every part of your body after a day full of walking in Monastiraki and Plaka. When you wake up, Greek breakfast will surprise you with its unique tastes! Choose amongst 33 rooms & 4 suites and... have a niche stay!

basic_data.name: Victory Inn
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: Situated in the centre of Athens and next to one of the biggest park of the city, Victory Inn offers great-value & comfortable accommodation. Just 500 metres from Victoria Metro Station for easy access to the historic district of Plaka and the Acropolis. Each of the rooms at Victory Inn is tastefully decorated and appointed with a host of modern amenities, including satellite TV, air conditioning and refrigerator for your comfort. The hotel staff are at your service 24-hours a day and happy to help you with all your requests. Victory Inn is just a short walk from the National Archaeological Museum and a host of bars and restaurants. From here, you can take the metro to the historical centre or even walk.

basic_data.name: Royal Olympic Hotel
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: The Royal Olympic is a newly fully refurbished 5* hotel located just in the centre of Athens, at a walking distance from all major archaeological sites, points of interest and public transports of the city, and within easy reach to/from the airport. The 264 rooms, and especially the unique Athenian Panorama rooms with a breathtaking view over the temple of Zeus and other major sites of the city, the 18 state of the art meeting rooms, the roof garden restaurant & bar lying in front of the Acropolis, temple of Zeus and Lycabettus Hill, the swimming pool, create a luxurious and warm environment where personal touch, service and attention to every single detail are very well looked after.Should it be for leisure, corporate or MICE travelers, the Royal Olympic offers a unique and authentic Athenian experience that will remain unforgettable to each guest.
features: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

basic_data.name: Acropolis View Hotel
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: In 1981 we took the leap. Acropolis View, in the heart of Athens, near the most important archaeological monuments of Greece, right in the middle of life, commerce, fun, flavor and tradition, offered quality services to the countless visitors from every corner of the world, every day of the year. Today, Acropolis View, ‘newer’ than ever, fully renovated, continues to offer hospitality and services that aim to satisfy the guest. In Acropolis View you feel you have found the ideal spot to spring from and get to know Athens. A hospitable embrace, the creation of professionals who design and offer their services with know-how and enthusiasm.

basic_data.name: City Circus Athens
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: City Circus is an alternative travelers space for the restless voyager, the escape artist, the acrobat. It's in the heart of Athens, in the hip Psirri neighborhood, beside numerous eateries and watering holes and a short walk from worthwhile sites. City Circus is in a 4-story, restored early 20th century mansion, complete with fresco-ed ceilings, wrought-iron balconies and baroque tiles. We’ve dressed it up with vintage furniture, reclaimed materials, modern design elements and street art by a selection of fresh local talent.

basic_data.name: Melia Athens
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: Welcome to Athens, where ancient history meets the vitality of one of the most exciting European cities. Indulge in the legacy of Greek hospitality which compliments the Meliá reputation and the Spanish heritage of passion for service. Whether you're here for work or just to stroll the city; this welcoming elegant hotel is situated in the heart of the intellectual part of the Greek capital. Let time slip away and explore ancient historic landmarks and discover the side street cafes and bookstores like a modern local philosopher. The rooms at Melia Athens include a flat-screen TV, air conditioning, minibar and free 3Mps Wifi available. Guests have free access to a fitness center, sauna, and Turkish bath, along with a rooftop pool and terrace (seasonal operation), and room service while staying at Melia Athens. With many well-known landmarks in the immediate vicinity, such as Monastiraki (1.1 km) and Temple of Hephaestus (1.2 km), Melia Athens guests have the opportunity to visit some of Athens' most popular attractions with ease. The hotel is a 5-minute walk from the Omonia Square metro stop. Athens is also known for its historic sites, including Acropolis, Parthenon, and Herod Atticus Odeon, which are not too far from Melia Athens. Melia Athens brings the best of Athens to you, making your stay both relaxing and enjoyable.
features: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

basic_data.name: Acropolis Museum Boutique Hotel
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: This very special hotel is housed in a classical building that recently has undergone a complete renovation (2007),just a few steps from the Acropolis and Plaka, adjacent to the new Acropolis museum, it is situated at the very heart of Athens historic center. The Acropolis Museum Hotel is at the foot of the Acropolis hill, just a few steps away from the Parthenon, the Temple of Zeus, Hadrian Arch and other monuments of Greek Civilization. Yet within a ten minute walk you can reach the Constitution Square (Syntagma), the Greek Parliament, Athens Stock market and Athens exclusive shopping areas of Ermou and Kolonaki.

basic_data.name: Athinais Hotel
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: Athinais is a 3star hotel, on Vas. Sofias Avenue very close to Athens Concert Hall (Megaron Moussikis), with access to public transportation. The hotel consists of 84 renovated rooms on six floors, suitable for business clients, travelers and families. It offers suitable spaces for conferences, seminars and special dinners. Free wireless internet available throughout the hotel. Brasserie 8am-11pm Cafe' is an ideal place for early meetings, lunch or dinner. Very good quality versus price.
features: Fitness Center with Gym / Workout Room

basic_data.name: Acropolis Ami Boutique Hotel
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: With a great experience in offering wonderful vacations, this renovated hotel is welcoming you with 18 rooms decorated in a vey relaxing and classy style. Acropolis Ami Boutique Hotel is situated in a quiet and safe area of Athens centre and is very well connected with all the areas of the city by all public transportation (such as: metro, tram and bus), also with the airport and the port. Famous touristic attractions like: Parthenon, Acropolis Museum, the Temple of the Olympian Zeus, Zappeion, Panathinaikon Stadium and Hadrian's Arch, Monastiraki and Psirri are situated within a cozy walking distance from the hotel. All the rooms are equipped with air-conditioning, small fridge, Wi-Fi, flat-screen TV and some of the rooms are offering a stunning view of Acropolis. Acropolis Ami Boutique Hotel is offering a rooftop terrace where in the warm months you can enjoy in the morning a rich buffet breakfast and in the night you can spoil yourself with a drink or a cocktail, in a relaxing atmosphere with a breathtaking view of Acropolis. Our staff is always ready to assist you, offering to you information about the city and also helping you to plan your trip in Greece. Come to enjoy your vacation in an authentic Greek atmosphere!

basic_data.name: Hotel Metropolis
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: The Metropolis Hotel is a small intimate hotel with an Acropolis view in the prime central location of the Plaka district and 2 blocks off Syntagma Square. The Metropolis provides all amenities and comforts that a traveler has come to expect. Warm hospitality and attentive service will help make your business or leisure stay in Athens extremely pleasant.

basic_data.name: Titania Hotel
basic_data.priceRange: $ (Based on Average Nightly Rates for a Standard Room from our Partners)

description: In the center of Athens, Titania Hotel offers comfort accommodation whether visiting for business or pleasure. In an idyllic setting, guests are welcome to experience our services and feel the vibe of Athens from within. Enjoy your stay in central hotel in Athens, in ample rooms and suites, fully functional, airy and bright. The comfort and convenience allow you to relax and get the energy you need for your adventures in Athens. Amongst the finest facilities at Titania Central Hotel Athens, our roof top at the Olive garden restaurant & bar, offers the ultimate scenery and the most breathtaking views to the city from atop. Enjoy simple dining at the Olive garden roof top restaurant & bar under the starlit sky, celebrating the olive as one of the most distinctive products of the Athenian land.
